name: New Hampshire
story: You just won your political party's primary election. Your campaign starts in this iconic state.
nav: press 1 to go to Georgia, press 2 to go to Hawaii, and press 3 to go to Idaho

name: Georgia
story: They are wild in this state, you have to eat chilli sauce for their 4 votes but you are allergic

story: Welcome to the state with surreal scenery and esoteric vistas

story: They don�t like you in this state, and are very openly hostile. You escape assasination

name: Illinois
story: hi there, welcome to Chicago. Cold and Chilli bue cool. The bosses rule. They invite you to dinner

story: A state of beautiful people. You are offered a spouse in exchange  for their votes. But you are married!

story: Welcome to the state of Magic. Enchanting!

story: The wild west has never been this appealing

story: Enjoy the beaches, Jazz and cuisine. A  good place to campaign, relax and get refreshed

story: welcome to Maine.  We need to know what you've got.

story: Take a peak at Washinton DC across the border. We can get you there

story: Care to visit the Great Lakes in Michigan?

story: We have got the votes here in New York. But you need to prove yourself

story: You are kidnapped and kept in a room.
nav: press 1 to go to the Alaska, 2 to run away to New Hampshire

name: Alaska
story: You made it to the Alaskan wilderness, unfortunately, your pack of dogs died and you die of frost bite and hunger, game over

name: Washington DC
story: Welcome Mr President and Commander -Chief of the armed forces. You won the election.
